text: Of the descendants of Asher, registered by name and lineage according to their clans and ancestral houses, every male of twenty years or more, everyone fit for military service:
But as for yourselves: turn back and proceed into the wilderness on the Red Sea road.
Then all the people went up after him, playing flutes and rejoicing so much the earth split with their shouting.
The sons of Shobal were Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. The sons of Zibeon were Aiah and Anah.
As her glory had been, so great was her dishonor: her exaltation was turned into mourning.
The Cleansing of a Leper. A leper came to him [and kneeling down] begged him and said, “If you wish, you can make me clean.”

Andrew, the brother of Simon Peter, was one of the two who heard John and followed Jesus.
